meanings.definition: A small room or closet in which food, dishes, and utensils are kept.
meanings.sent1: My mom asked me to grab some plates from the pantries.
meanings.sent2: The pantries in our house are always stocked with snacks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally locked myself in the pantries while looking for a snack!
meanings.sent4: The pantries were a treasure trove of delicious treats waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The pantries smelled of spices and freshly baked bread, enticing anyone who entered.
